where is those lights from!

> 
> Nice. Can we expect a scramjet in the future?

ItÂ´s out!

my Speed was 2000 m/s. Mach 6
How did you stick two engines to the end of a MK.2 fuselage section? I need to know D:

> 
> How did you stick two engines to the end of a MK.2 fuselage section? I need to know D:

I\'m pretty sure it\'s done by using part rotation glitches to attach Mk.1 fuselages inside the Mk.2, and attaching the engines to those.

NO. I use the Bicoupler

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0)

> 
> where is those lights from!

chickenplucker\'s [Bigtrack](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9404.0)

What should i do next ?

But I only can make .cfg edit sorry :\'(

A version of the radial body that has a snowball chance\'s in hell of keeping the ScramJets from overheating.

The stock one just explodes from all the heat the scrams dump into it.

How about an insanley fast air-breathing engine? like makes you go say, 1000 M/S? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

BTW: i do config edits only too, so its not like your alone.

(mod: creeper corp, if anyone is interested)
We are searching a texturer and someone who know a lot about nodes and attachment!

Nice Project rocketsciencist

 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Wanna use it on much different situations
Thanks!
So basically, Don does all the hard work modeling and texturing the project and you get the credit for having an 'imaginative' brain? Yeah, that seems fair.
Now i want that tadeass is in the team too so he make the textur and UV.

> 
> So basically, Don does all the hard work modeling and texturing the project and you get the credit for having an 'imaginative' brain? Yeah, that seems fair.

I don\'t know how you, but I\'m doing textures/models for fun, because I want to give some more parts to the Kerbal community, not for fame. I don\'t mind, and Rocketscienist have his own role.
Sorry TadeAss, I didn\'t know you were on the team. But in what role does RocketScientist play that is actually important.

I write how much fuel is in the tanks, how much thrust the engines have......

I make the desriptions and so on (In english, IÂ´m in 8th class)

> 
> I write how much fuel is in the tanks, how much thrust the engines have......
> 
> I make the desriptions and so on (In english, IÂ´m in 8th class)

How is that even remotely difficult?

I canÂ´t do 3D modelling or make really good textures!!!!! ThatÂ´s the problem.

I searched one how can implement my ideas.

Ok, I think we can stop with that. We do what we want to do.

@OtherDalfite Thanks for name update.

> 
> I canÂ´t do 3D modelling or make really good textures!!!!! ThatÂ´s the problem.
> 
> I searched one how can implement my ideas.

That\'s why you LEARN how to. You can\'t go around claiming to be a part of something when you aren\'t doing a very large amount of work. CFG editing takes what, five minutes? Unless you are really working to make it a well balanced part, you really shouldn\'t be claiming the work to be your own.
NOW itÂ´s enought!
